title: American cinema
creator_credit: Greg Martinelli, Molly Ornati, Rita Mate, BBC, KCET (Television station : Los Angeles, Calif.) and New York Center for Visual History
brief_description: A 13 part series examining the cinema industry. Producers, directors, actors, cinematographers and Hollywood stars reveal insights into the business of making motion pictures. John Lithgow introduces each episode which encompasses a theme and examines it in detail with clips from some of the world’s renown films.
creator_credit_for_label: Greg Martinelli, Molly Ornati, Rita Mate, BBC, KCET (Television station : Los Angeles, Calif.) and New York Center for Visual History
